meanings: a running fight, a pursuit battle
chase, pursuit, chase, pursue (after), run after, (formal) give chase (to)

meanings.meaning: Last battle of the battleship Bismarck

examples.korean: Also in the chase is the 'Good' (Jeong), a bounty hunter whose mission is to capture the 'Weird.' 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 추격(전)에는, '이상한 놈'을 잡는 것이 그의 임무인 현상금 사냥꾼, '좋은 놈(정우성)'도 끼어든다. Neungyule

examples.korean: The bank robbers were caught after a car chase. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자동차 추격전 끝에 은행 강도들이 붙잡혔다 Neungyule
examples.english: The bank robbers were caught after a car chase. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: And so at advertising agencies where the eternal cat and mouse game is played out between those who make things and those who buy them, they are being very careful. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그래서, 물건을 만드는 회사와 그 물건들을 사는 소비자들간에 영원한 추격전이 벌어지는 분야에서 일해야 하는 광고업체들은 요즘 무척이나 조심스럽습니다.
